reviews.customers_say: Customers find this cardigan to be a lovely vintage-style piece with a bright red color that looks expensive, and they appreciate its super soft, dressier feel. The fit is snug, and they consider it good value for money. However, the size runs slightly small, and several customers note that the sleeves are too short.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute cardigan
items.body: Very nice lightweight cardigan. The quality is great. The stripe design makes it really striking. The fit is true to size. Definitely not oversized. The sweater with a wide leg khaki pants makes a classic yet trendy outfit. Read more
items.author: Mountaineer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice fit well made and different looking
items.body: Classy and unique, buy it in every color! Love the style, and the sleeve length is perfect. Excellent color and cost Read more

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Overall happy with purchase
items.body: Color was bright and same as pictured. Sleeves are a bit short and not gathered, so loose around wrists. Overall happy with purchase. Looks cute with every style. Read more
items.author: Kitty Kat

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality sweater!
items.body: Excellent quality, well made, very cute, true to size Read more
items.author: cynthia

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality
items.body: Cute and good quality Read more
items.author: Amy

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Color pops, but fit & sizing not so much
items.body: It's a splendid color but not as fitted as the pictures would lead you to believe. I got a small & it's baggy... I'm slender but not skinny or petite so if you're on the slighter build, this might not hug you the way you want, if fitted is the look you're seeking. Also, the bottom portion hits around the hips, not the waist. On me, at least, & I'm even a bit long in the torso. The color is really lovely though, a real vibrant poppy red just like the pics. I'm iffy on keeping it because of fit. Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not Cheap
items.body: Very well made, lighter weight (perfect for Florida winters), cardigan sweater. Size small fits perfectly on 5’11”. Arms are not too short. Read more
items.author: Jen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice
items.body: Looks EXACTLY like the pic. I've just never worn it! The fit and quality is amazing. I'll wear it soon... I think. The weather is changing. Read more
items.author: Juice

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Lake Blue, Khaki, Pink, White, Apricot, Army Green, Black, Light Pink, Navy Blue, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
